channel.title: Source recorder in Half-Life 1 source
channel.description: Yesterday I tried to use the demo recorder in Half-Life 1 Source. The recording went just well, but when I try to open the demo in any way, including demoui, the game just freezes, and stops working. Is this an issue with the rest of you or just me?

item.title: Source recorder in Half-Life 1 source
item.dc:creator: wheybags
item.description:
[noparse]I’ve heard of the problem before.
Apparently it works if you play it back from HL:S deathmatch.[/noparse]

Read full topic

item.title: Source recorder in Half-Life 1 source
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Wait, wait wait!
Are you using HL: Source, or the original Half-life 1 (goldsource engine)? I think that might make helping you easier. AFAIK, the goldsource demo recorder is very buggy, I’ve had odd things happen while watching demos with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Source recorder in Half-Life 1 source
item.dc:creator: mr.FREEMANZ
item.description:
Savant:

:facepalm:

Source recorder is included with Half Life 1 Source, so I can’t switch it.:fffuuu:

You can download different ones.

Read full topic

item.title: Source recorder in Half-Life 1 source
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Works for me, but I’ve got the non-steam version of hls…

Read full topic

item.title: Source recorder in Half-Life 1 source
item.dc:creator: The_Minotaur
item.description:
Maybe, but you can use different programs instead. Anyway, have you tried testing it within other source games? Is it just Half Life, or is it a problem with all of them.

Read full topic

item.title: Source recorder in Half-Life 1 source
item.dc:creator: Savant
item.description:
mr.FREEMANZ!!!!!!!!:

Try getting a different source recorder. Don’t know what else to tell you. Sorry!

:facepalm:

Source recorder is included with Half Life 1 Source, so I can’t switch it.:fffuuu:

Read full topic
